dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1518 IS: Strengthening America’s Turning Point Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the Saratoga National Historical Park as the Saratoga National Battlefield Park.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strengthening America’s Turning Point Act.

subsection.text: The Saratoga National Historical Park shall be known and designated as the Saratoga National Battlefield Park.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Saratoga National Historical Park shall be deemed to be a reference to the Saratoga National Battlefield Park.
